original_text:
“Put the trumpet to your lips!
    An eagle is over the house of the Lord
because the people have broken my covenant
    and rebelled against my law.
korean_text: 나팔을 네 입에 댈지어다 원수가 독수리처럼 여호와의 집에 덮치리니 이는 그들이 내 언약을 어기며 내 율법을 범함이로다

sentences.original_text: Put the trumpet to your lips!
An eagle is over the house of the Lord
because the people have broken my covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 백성이 나의 언약을 깨뜨렸기 때문이다
